text: (Napiye!) Nayavancakarkalum, ullattil (pava) noyullavarkalum, matinavil poyp piraccaram ceykiravarkalum (iniyum tankal visamattiliruntu) vilakikkollavitil niccayamaka nam um'maiye avarkal mitu evivittu vituvom. Pinnar, atil umakku arukil veku corpa nalkale tavira avarkal vacittirukka mutiyatu
